public class PluginInstanceFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Class for creating instances of the implementor according properties.

installNewImplementorInstance

public Implementor installNewImplementorInstance(java.lang.Class plugin,
                                                 java.lang.String parms)
                                          throws AgentServiceException
Install the new implementor instance in the program. Get the constructor of the implementor from the plugin Class object. Encyptes and saves data for this instance in unique properties file

Parameters:
plugin - - the Class object of new plugin
parms - - params for saving
Returns:
- Implementor object with the constructor
Throws:
AgentServiceException
